title: I cant download new patch 7.11
body: Hi, I have little problem with new patch 7.11 when I started updating new patch everything was okey but then it stops at 24.2MB /24.8MB and it doesnt update anymore.. can you help me please?

replies.body: Give it some time, it should eventually update.
i've waited more then 5 hrs to reinstall and my lol client is still loading...

I'm not sure if you're still having issues getting patched since it's been so long, but sometimes the last bit of those patches lags a bit as it calculates what needs to be updating. Let it sit for a few minutes and it should move on, but if not try updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure a firewall or something isn't blocking the update.
